reviewText: A long time player of this game, this is one of my favorites. The different components of the game gradually increase for a casual gaming experience, but don't mistake all the levels for easy. Because he can't jump, anything one block tall is a wall to him. The large campaign is great and the level creator is fairly convenient with hotkeys for each block in the game. (There's also a menu of them for those who can't remember.) Overall great game, and if you think you can beat all of these puzzles without a walkthrough, I wish you good luck!
